welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful St. Pete Beach! Known for its stunning white sand beaches and charming atmosphere, we invite you to relax, explore, and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport caters to executive and VIP travelers, providing a luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A at Tampa International Airport serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as Southwest and British Airways.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as American and Lufthansa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at SRQ serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at SRQ is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
